alert.note: Alert for Montgomery (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued February 23 at 11:51AM EST until February 23 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 745 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...A portion of eastern New York, including the following county, Montgomery. * WHEN...Until 745 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1150 AM EST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain. Minor flooding is already occurring in the advisory area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Fonda, Fultonville and Berryville. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
